content: peppermint coasters by carolyn calderon > this pattern is available for free on > my blog the downloadable pdf listed > for sale contains the full pattern in > one printable file without > advertisements these coasters are fun to make and are a great way to use up left over yarn the edging is made with two colors and alternating chains the finished coaster measures approximately 5 inches my patterns are written in standard american terms and include pictures and explanations as necessary to make them easy to follow follow me on facebook https //www facebook com/thepurpleponcho/ thank you for your interest in my designs have a great day carolyn text and images c the purple poncho all rights reserved
